name: Undead's Treasure
description:
Created for the ScoreSpace Jam #12

Theme: Combining!

  • Move with WASD or the arrow keys.
  • Pick up blocks with E and throw them with Q.
  • You can ain the selector and the block with the same keys that you move
  • Press ESC two times to pause the game. This is because the first one is to unlock the mouse.

Known bugs

  • You can clip into the blocks by doing certain actions
  • Sometimes the player animation freezes and you become invincible

These are already fixed, but will be published once the gamejam finishes, so don't be too harsh if you encounter them

Gamejam.com page
https://gamejam.com/game/undead-s-treasure
